text: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
translation: Imana Allah Ijejwe kubatomorera inzira yayo y’ubwislamu igororotse. Hambavu y’ivyo, hari n’izindi nzira ziciye kubiri n’ubwislamu, zihubisha [332]. Iyo rero Imana Allah Ibishaka, Yari kubarongora mwese mu nzira yayo;
footnotes: [332] Inzira zihubisha, ni inzira y'idini canke iciyumviro giciye kubiri n'ubwislamu.
